title: It's a Man's World
overview: It's a Man's World centers on four young men who live in a houseboat moored at an Ohio River town named Cordella. The main characters were college student Wes Macauley and his younger brother Howie, recently orphaned by an auto accident; Tom-Tom DeWitt, another college student; and Vern Hodges, a foot-loose type who moves in to join them.
